imdb.title: Sharky and Scuba Steve Minecraft Adventures
akas: Sharky and Scuba Steve Minecraft Adventures (United States)
plot: Join Sharky and Scuba Steve from the Little Club in these kid-friendly Minecraft episodes. They go on tons of adventures with their best friends and always have fun. Learn new Minecraft tips, tricks and tutorials.
